item.title: Majd al-Shaghnobi was trying to get humanitarian aid in Gaza last year when an Israeli tank shell exploded nearby. He was evacuated to Egypt - with Israel's permission - for further medical treatment. Now, he's at Great Ormond Street children's hospital i
item.description: Majd al-Shaghnobi was trying to get humanitarian aid in Gaza last year when an Israeli tank shell exploded nearby. He was evacuated to Egypt - with Israel's permission - for further medical treatment. Now, he's at Great Ormond Street children's hospital i
